column4: How do i get ld in my way, and dos it have to be done before or after shutdown of X
install ld, and it should be in your path
yep
and for future reference, it's in your path, not your way ;-)
nope.
i don't think so./
lemme find what package it's in
how and where
install binutils
ive tryed lookin on them but dont know wich one??
just install "binutils"
binutils contains ld
i know but dont know wich
there is no "which".  there's a package called binutils.  just plain binutils.  install it.
theres some binutils
rgr
install the one called "binutils".  nothing else.
i have no idea what you're trying to do, honestly
ooooh.  well if you drop to a virtual terminal (crtl-alt-f1) and log in there, do "sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop"
that ought to get rid of X for you
sudo killall Xorg
yes.
